text: Pierre Alexandre Pastour de Costebelle (Nyons, 20 February 1750 — Bellone, off Paris, 1791) was a French Navy officer. == Biography == In November 1782, Costebelle was at Ceylon, in command of Naïade, a 20-gun corvette. He took part in the Battle of Cuddalore on 20 June 1783, commanding the 40-gun frigate Consolante. == Sources and references == Notes References Bibliography * * External links * Category:French Navy officers
title: Pierre Alexandre Pastour de Costebelle
